metadata.title: CVE-2022-26385 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
[Unknown description]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-26385` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 98.0+build3-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
firefox-geckodriver - 98.0+build3-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 98.0+build3-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '98.0+build3-0ubuntu0.21.10.2').
